articles.title: Asia stocks muted in holiday-thinned trade, Japan dips on dismal GDP - Investing.com
articles.description: Asia stocks muted in holiday-thinned trade, Japan dips on dismal GDP
articles.content: Investing.com-- Most Asian stocks kept to a tight range on Monday as a market holiday in China kept trading volumes dull, while Japanese shares retreated on dismal fourth quarter economic growth data… [+2389 chars]
